name: Limitless Limits
description:
This demo was made solo for the 2023 UNC Collegiate Game Jam in 9 days.

Fight off hordes of slimes while also dealing with a random limitation. One game you might not be able to attack upwards, and the next you might not be able to run. Can you overcome your limitations and save yourself?

Credits

Everything except art - Rhys Gilliam (the only thing I drew were the hearts <3)

Characters and tilemap assets - https://game-endeavor.itch.io/mystic-woods

UI assets - https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/gui/icons/2d-simple-ui-pack-218050

Title written by ChatGPT
